{{Disambiguation}}

'''Lava Chicken''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{ItemLink|Cooked Chicken}} – the [[food]] item which the [[Movie:Chicken#Cooked|lava chicken]] is based on.
* [[Lava Chicken Add-On]] – an [[add-on]] based on the lava chicken, used to promote the [[A Minecraft Movie|movie]] before its release.
* {{ItemLink|Music Disc Lava Chicken}} – an 8-bit remix [[music disc]] based on [[Movie:Steve's Lava Chicken (song)|the song with the same name]] in {{AMCM}}.
** [[Minecraft: Lava Chicken (Original Game Soundtrack)]] – the [[soundtrack]] of the music disc.

== ''A Minecraft Movie'' ==
* {{MovieLink|Lava Chicken|link=Chicken#Cooked}} – a chicken cooked using lava, appropriately named "lava chicken" by {{AMCM|Steve}}.
* {{AMCM|Steve's Lava Chicken (song)}} – a song about the joys of cooked chicken meat.
* {{MovieLink|Steve's Lava Chicken!}} – a location in {{AMCM|Midport Village}} built by Steve which serves cooked chicken and snow cones.
